resources.string: A car is an expensive toy
Android Market not available, trying to download from chartdroid
Please fill in the car data

Thank you for trying this application!

This application calculates how much a car will cost annually based on how much it is used. The base cost is calculated based on age, fuel consumption, carbon dioxide emission value and weight. A new car can be added by pressing the menu button. Currently the algorithm only calculates according to Finnish regulations and the cost does not include insurance costs. However, support for other countries and more input data can be added in future versions.

We hope you will enjoy this app and that it will help you make good decisions (if this is even possible in the business of buying cars).
Do you want to delete %s and all its data from the list ?
